ClassDesc: Extension of @B_android#view#Menu_E@ for context menus providing functionality to modify the header of the context menu. Context menus do not support item shortcuts and item icons. To show a context menu on long click, most clients will want to call @B_android#app#Activity#registerForContextMenu_E@ and override @B_android#app#Activity#onCreateContextMenu_E@.
